Name: Painted fresco
Description: A fragment of painted scene from a tomb. The deceased, Heka-maat-ra-nakht, is depicted as a mummy at the entrance to his tomb, with a priest standing behind him in full dress. A female mourner, probably the deceased's wife, Wiay, kneels at the lower left corner wearing a long linen dress, long wig and band. The mummy has several garlands of flowers draped about it.Hekmare was the First Prophet of Montu during the reigns of Ramesses III-IV.
